1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Secret Interview's unwitting candidates believe that they are filming a documentary about their workplace. In fact, they are about to have an interview for an amazing job without even realising it. Tested to their limits by a team of undercover actors intent on causing utter chaos, their prospective new boss, a giant of their industry, watches everything and judges their performance.
imdb.title: Secret Interview
plot: _Secret Interview_ (qv)'s unwitting candidates believe that they are filming a documentary about their workplace. In fact, they are about to have an interview for an amazing job without even realising it. Tested to their limits by a team of undercover actors intent on causing utter chaos, their prospective new boss, a giant of their industry, watches everything and judges their performance.::channel5.com
